oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gait Analysis of older adults with OAB
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gibson, William
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 3D IGA of older adults with OAB, walking under three conditions - bladder empty, when experiencing urgency, and when performing a simultaneous distracting task.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
Gait
Divided attention
Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms
Urinary urgency
